title: Game Overview
description: Explore Star Atlas AAA space exploration MMO across immersive third-person adventure, strategic fleet command, and browser-based gameplay modes.
poster: src/GAME section/3rd Person Experience/Thumbnails in carousel/Slide_1_ImageThumbnail.png
intro: Star Atlas offers multiple ways to experience the Galia Expanse. Explore on foot in third-person, command vast fleets from a strategic view, or dive into the economy. Choose your path and shape the galaxy's future.

features.title: Third-Person Experience
features.description: Immerse yourself in AAA-quality exploration. Walk the decks of your ships, engage in FPS combat, and experience Galia up close.

features.title: Fleet Command RTS
features.description: Switch to a top-down strategic view to manage your entire armada. Coordinate fleet movements, control territories, and outmaneuver rival factions.

features.title: Browser-Based Play
features.description: Access Star Atlas from any device. SAGE Labs and Holosim bring the economy and fleet simulation to your browser. No downloads required.

cta.title: Ready to Begin?
cta.text: Choose your entry point into the Star Atlas universe. Start with the free Holosim simulation or dive into the full experience.

title: Galia Expanse
description: Explore the vast Galia Expanse, the uncharted heart of Star Atlas where three factions vie for control of resources, territory, and the galaxy's future.
poster: src/GAME section/3rd Person Experience/Thumbnails in carousel/Slide_1_ImageThumbnail.png
intro: The Galia Expanse is a vast, uncharted region teeming with opportunities and dangers. From resource-rich asteroid fields to mysterious anomalies, Galia serves as the primary battleground where MUD, ONI, and Ustur factions compete for dominance.

lore.title: The Cataclysm
lore.text: Long ago, the rogue planet Iris collided with seven child planets, creating 'The Cataclysm.' Dense with invaluable materials and radiating mysterious energy, this catastrophic event birthed a unique form of free energy and the most coveted resource zone in the galaxy. The Tufa, enigmatic hybrid mineral-organic beings, now guard the asteroid belts near Iris with zealous intensity.

features.title: Exploration & Discovery
features.description: Navigate uncharted territories filled with hidden resources, ancient artifacts, and mysterious celestial phenomena.

features.title: Resource Extraction
features.description: Mine asteroids and planetary surfaces for essential materials. Titanium, carbon, hydrogen, and rare elements fuel the galactic economy.

features.title: Faction Territories
features.description: Galia is divided among MUD, ONI, and Ustur. Your allegiance shapes your alliances, enemies, and strategic opportunities.

guide.title: Getting Started in Galia
steps: Choose your faction alignment (MUD, ONI, or Ustur)
Acquire your first ship via the Galactic Marketplace
Complete introductory missions to learn navigation
Begin resource extraction to fund your expansion
Join a DAC (guild) for collaborative gameplay

cta.title: Enter the Expanse
cta.text: The Galia Expanse awaits. Whether you seek fortune, glory, or galactic domination, your journey begins here.

title: Game Modes
description: Experience AAA shooter arena battles, high-speed racing, PvE dogfights, and more in Star Atlas. The space exploration MMO with something for every pilot.
poster: src/GAME section/3rd Person Experience/Thumbnails in carousel/Slide_2_ImageThumbnail.png
intro: Star Atlas delivers diverse gameplay experiences designed for different playstyles. From intense PvP combat arenas to cooperative PvE missions, the game offers something for combat enthusiasts, strategists, and explorers alike.

features.title: Arena Combat
features.description: Test your piloting skills in dedicated combat arenas. The X5 Arena features dedicated servers for smooth, competitive ship-to-ship battles.

features.title: Racing Circuits
features.description: Push your ships to their limits on high-speed racing tracks through asteroid fields and space stations.

features.title: PvE Encounters
features.description: Face AI-controlled enemies in dogfights and missions. Complete bounties, defend convoys, and take on escalating challenges.

features.title: Open World
features.description: Roam freely through the Galia Expanse. The open-world mode combines exploration, combat, mining, and trading.

cta.title: Choose Your Battle
cta.text: Whether you prefer structured arena combat or the freedom of open-world exploration, Star Atlas has a mode for you.

title: Your Fleet, Your Way
description: Build, customize, and command your fleet in Star Atlas. Explore ship interiors, manage armadas, and shape your path in the Galia Expanse.
poster: src/GAME section/3rd Person Experience/Thumbnails in carousel/Slide_3_ImageThumbnail.png
intro: In Star Atlas, ships serve as homes, businesses, and strategic assets. Explore every deck of your vessels, customize their loadouts, and build a fleet that reflects your ambitions in the Galia Expanse.

features.title: Ship Interiors
features.description: Walk through fully realized ship interiors. From the bridge to the cargo hold, every space is explorable and functional.

features.title: Fleet Management
features.description: Manage your entire armada from a single interface. Assign ships to missions, coordinate movements, and optimize your fleet composition.

features.title: Customization
features.description: Outfit your ships with weapons, modules, and cosmetics. Every ship can be tailored to your preferred playstyle.

features.title: Fleet Rentals
features.description: Turn idle ships into income or access powerful vessels without ownership. The Fleet Rental Program creates opportunities for all players.

guide.title: Building Your First Fleet
steps: Start with a ship role of your choice
Learn your ship's interior layout and systems
Acquire specialized vessels as you identify your playstyle
Consider renting ships to test before buying
Join fleet operations with your DAC for large-scale coordination

cta.title: Build Your Legacy
cta.text: Your fleet is your empire. Start building today and leave your mark on the Galia Expanse.

title: Life in Galia
description: Discover the diverse alien species of Star Atlas, from the furred Punaabs to luminous beings of pure light. The Galia Expanse teems with life.
poster: src/GAME section/3rd Person Experience/Thumbnails in carousel/Slide_4_ImageThumbnail.png
intro: The Galia Expanse is home to an extraordinary diversity of life. Three major factions, each comprising multiple species with unique cultures and technologies, compete and cooperate in shaping the galaxy's future.

lore.title: The Council of Peace
lore.text: After the devastating Convergence War, the surviving factions established the Council of Peace, a fragile alliance that maintains order in Galia. Each faction brings its own history, strengths, and vision for the future, creating a rich tapestry of politics, culture, and conflict.

features.title: MUD (Manus Ultima Divina)
features.description: The human faction, originating from Earth. Under the leadership of Charon Gotti Jr., MUD has transformed from its controversial origins into an industrial powerhouse built on fair trade and diplomatic relations.

features.title: ONI Consortium
features.description: A coalition of diverse alien species united by shared interests. ONI represents technological advancement and the pursuit of knowledge across the stars.

features.title: Ustur Sector
features.description: A faction of sentient androids guided by logic and efficiency. The Ustur seek to optimize existence itself, bringing a unique perspective to galactic affairs.

features.title: The Tufa
features.description: Mysterious hybrid mineral-organic beings dwelling near the Cataclysm zone. The Tufa guard the galaxy's most valuable resources with zealous intensity.

cta.title: Choose Your Path
cta.text: Your faction shapes your story. Will you fight for humanity's future, pursue knowledge with the ONI, or embrace the cold logic of the Ustur?

title: Fleet Command
description: Command vast fleets from a strategic top-down RTS view in Star Atlas. Dominate territories, manage resources, and outmaneuver rival factions.
intro: Fleet Command transforms Star Atlas into a grand strategy experience. Currently in development. Shift from third-person exploration to a strategic overview where you'll coordinate armadas, control territory, and shape Galia's political landscape.

lore.title: The Art of Command
lore.text: In the vastness of Galia, individual heroism only goes so far. The great powers of the galaxy are built by those who can coordinate fleets of hundreds of ships, manage supply lines across light-years, and outthink their opponents before the first shot is fired.

features.title: Strategic Overview
features.description: See the bigger picture. The top-down view reveals fleet positions, resource nodes, faction territories, and strategic opportunities invisible from the cockpit.

features.title: Mass Fleet Operations
features.description: Command dozens or hundreds of ships simultaneously. Issue coordinated orders, manage formations, and execute complex tactical maneuvers.

features.title: Territory Control
features.description: Establish and defend control over valuable regions. Starbases serve as your footholds in contested space.

features.title: Faction Politics
features.description: Navigate the complex web of faction relationships. Form alliances, negotiate agreements, and wage economic or military warfare.

guide.title: Fleet Command Basics
steps: Access Fleet Command from your capital ship's bridge
Familiarize yourself with the strategic map and controls
Start with small fleet operations to learn coordination
Establish your first starbase in a contested region
Coordinate with your DAC for large-scale operations

cta.title: Take Command
cta.text: The galaxy doesn't conquer itself. Rise from pilot to admiral and lead your faction to dominance.

title: Holosim
description: Play Holosim, a free-to-play strategic fleet simulation in Star Atlas. No downloads, no crypto wallet required. Experience fleet command instantly.
intro: Holosim brings Fleet Command to your browser, free to play and instantly accessible. An in-universe simulation that lets you experience strategic gameplay without special hardware or a crypto wallet. The perfect entry point into Star Atlas.

features.title: Instant Access
features.description: No downloads, no installations, no wallet setup. Open your browser and start commanding fleets within minutes.

features.title: Free to Play
features.description: Experience Star Atlas fleet mechanics without any upfront investment. Holosim is designed to welcome new players to the universe.

features.title: Real Mechanics
features.description: Holosim offers genuine Star Atlas fleet command simulation with meaningful strategic depth. This is real gameplay, accessible to everyone.

features.title: Path to Full Game
features.description: Skills learned in Holosim transfer directly to the full Star Atlas experience. Graduate from simulation to reality when you're ready.

guide.title: Getting Started with Holosim
steps: Visit the Star Atlas Holosim portal
Create a free account (no wallet required)
Complete the tutorial to learn basic fleet commands
Participate in simulation battles
Connect your wallet when ready to enter the real economy

cta.title: Try It Now
cta.text: No barriers, no risk. Experience Star Atlas fleet command in your browser right now.

title: SAGE Labs
description: Mine resources, craft items, and power the Star Atlas economy in SAGE Labs. The browser-based gateway to the Galia Expanse.
intro: SAGE Labs is where real economic gameplay happens. Fully on-chain, every action carries weight. Mine resources, craft gear, trade on open markets. Your decisions have lasting consequences in a persistent, player-driven economy.

lore.title: The Golden Era
lore.text: SAGE represents the current era of Star Atlas, a time of expansion, opportunity, and economic growth. As players establish starbases, extract resources, and build the infrastructure of galactic civilization, they're writing the history that will define the future of Galia.

features.title: Resource Mining
features.description: Extract valuable resources from asteroids and planets. Your mining operations fuel the crafting economy and generate income.

features.title: Crafting System
features.description: Transform raw materials into valuable items, components, and equipment. Supply the marketplace and build your manufacturing empire.

features.title: SDU Scanning
features.description: Scan for Survey Data Units, valuable data packages that provide resources and information. SDU hunting is a unique gameplay loop.

features.title: Starbased Integration
features.description: SAGE Labs connects to the broader Starbased system. Your economic activities contribute to your faction's starbase network.

guide.title: Starting in SAGE Labs
steps: Connect your Solana wallet with Star Atlas assets
Assign your ships to fleet operations
Begin mining operations at resource-rich locations
Process resources and craft valuable items
Sell on the Galactic Marketplace for ATLAS tokens

cta.title: Build Your Economy
cta.text: The Star Atlas economy runs on player activity. Every resource mined, item crafted, and trade executed shapes the galaxy. Start building in SAGE Labs.
